schema.description: Resource type definition as defined in RFC 7644 Section 6

endpoint.description: The resource type's HTTP-addressable endpoint relative to the base URL

meta.description: Resource metadata as defined in RFC 7643 Section 3.1

created.description: The timestamp when the resource was created

lastModified.description: The timestamp when the resource was last modified

resourceType.description: The name of the resource type (e.g., User, Group)

version.description:
The version of the resource. Used for ETag-based versioning.
Weak ETags are prefixed with W/

meta.title: ResourceMetadata

name.description: The resource type's name (e.g., User, Group)

schema.description: The resource type's primary/base schema URI

schemaExtensions.description: List of schema extensions for this resource type

required.description: Indicates whether the schema extension is required

schema.description: The URI of the extended schema

schema.title: ResourceType
